cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.description: A refreshing Cuban classic with lime and mint that's perfect for warm weather.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves gently with sugar syrup in a glass.
Add lime juice and rum.
Fill with crushed ice and top with soda water.
Garnish with a sprig of mint.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: The quintessential whiskey cocktail, simple yet sophisticated.
instructions: Place sugar cube in a rocks glass and saturate with bitters.
Add a splash of water and muddle until dissolved.
Fill glass with large ice cubes and add whiskey.
Stir gently for 20-30 seconds.
Garnish with an orange peel, expressing the oils over the drink.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.description: Mexico's most famous cocktail, a perfect balance of sweet, sour and salty.
instructions: Rim a chilled glass with salt.
Combine tequila, Cointreau and lime juice in a shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds.
Strain into the prepared glass over fresh ice.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.description: A beautifully bitter Italian aperitif with perfect balance.
instructions: Add gin, vermouth and Campari to a mixing glass with ice.
Stir for 20-30 seconds until well chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A perfectly balanced rum sour that showcases simplicity at its finest.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds.
Double strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: A modern classic that perfectly combines coffee and vodka.
instructions: Brew a fresh shot of espresso and let it cool slightly.
Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice.
Shake hard for 15 seconds to create a frothy top.
Double strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with three coffee beans.

cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.description: A creamy tropical escape that transports you to the Caribbean.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a hurricane glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and cherry.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.description: A sophisticated whiskey cocktail that's stood the test of time since the 1870s.
instructions: Add whiskey, vermouth and bitters to a mixing glass with ice.
Stir for 30 seconds until well chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: A perfectly balanced blend of bourbon, citrus and sweetness with a silky texture.
instructions: Add bourbon, lemon juice, syrup and egg white to a shaker.
Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for 15 seconds.
Add ice and shake again for another 15 seconds.
Double strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
Dash bitters on top of the foam for garnish.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: An iconic pink cocktail that defined an era of stylish drinking.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds.
Double strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with an orange peel or lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.description: The king of tiki cocktails, a complex blend of rums and tropical flavors.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously for 15 seconds.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with a spent lime shell and mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Gin & Tonic
cocktails.description: The ultimate refresher -- simple, elegant, endlessly customizable.
instructions: Fill a copa or highball glass with ice cubes.
Pour gin over the ice.
Top with tonic water, pouring slowly.
Gently stir once or twice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.description: A zesty vodka cocktail with ginger beer kick, traditionally served in a copper mug.
instructions: Fill a copper mug or highball glass with ice.
Pour in vodka and lime juice.
Top with ginger beer.
Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Aperol Spritz
cocktails.description: Italy's beloved aperitivo, bright orange and effervescent.
instructions: Fill a large wine glass with ice.
Pour Aperol over the ice.
Add Prosecco.
Top with a splash of soda water.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Paloma
cocktails.description: Mexico's most popular tequila cocktail, grapefruit-forward and deeply refreshing.
instructions: Rim a highball glass with salt if desired.
Fill with ice and add tequila.
Pour in grapefruit juice and lime juice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge.

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.description: A tall, refreshing gin fizz that's been quenching thirsts since the 1870s.
instructions: Combine gin, lemon juice and syrup in a shaker with ice.
Shake for 10 seconds.
Strain into a tall glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water.
Garnish with a lemon slice and cherry.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
cocktails.description: A bold Bermudian classic pairing dark rum with spicy ginger beer.
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour ginger beer over the ice.
Slowly float dark rum on top by pouring over the back of a spoon.
Squeeze lime juice on top.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.description: Brazil's national cocktail, a punchy mix of cachaca, lime and sugar.
instructions: Cut lime into wedges and place in a rocks glass.
Add sugar and muddle firmly to release juices.
Fill with crushed ice.
Pour cachaca over the top.
Stir well and serve.

cocktails.name: Zombie
cocktails.description: A dangerously strong tiki classic with multiple rums and tropical juices.
instructions: Combine all ingredients except dark rum in a shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously for 15 seconds.
Strain into a tall glass filled with crushed ice.
Float dark rum on top.
Garnish with a mint sprig and fruit.

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.description: An elegant champagne cocktail with gin, named after a powerful French cannon.
instructions: Combine gin, lemon juice and syrup in a shaker with ice.
Shake for 10 seconds.
Strain into a champagne flute.
Top with chilled champagne.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Boulevardier
cocktails.description: A rich, warming twist on the Negroni made with bourbon instead of gin.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice.
Stir for 20-30 seconds until well chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Penicillin
cocktails.description: A modern classic blending smoky scotch with honey, ginger and lemon.
instructions: Combine blended scotch, lemon juice and honey-ginger syrup in a shaker with ice.
Shake for 15 seconds.
Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
Float Islay scotch on top.
Garnish with a piece of candied ginger.

cocktails.name: Bramble
cocktails.description: A berry-forward gin cocktail created in London, bursting with blackberry flavor.
instructions: Combine gin, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a shaker with ice.
Shake for 10 seconds.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice.
Drizzle creme de mure over the top, letting it bleed through the ice.
Garnish with fresh blackberries and a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.description: A visually stunning layered cocktail that mimics a desert sunrise.
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice.
Pour tequila and orange juice over the ice.
Stir gently.
Slowly pour grenadine down the side of the glass, letting it sink.
Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

cocktails.name: B-52
cocktails.description: A layered shot of coffee, Irish cream and orange liqueur, often served flaming.
instructions: Pour coffee liqueur into a shot glass.
Slowly layer Irish cream on top by pouring over the back of a spoon.
Slowly layer Grand Marnier on top of the Irish cream the same way.
Optionally, ignite the top layer briefly before drinking.
